--- Round 9 ---
President: Anika, Nominee for Chancellor: Enrique
Ollama Request: [{'role': 'user', 'content': 'You are Anika, a player in Secret Hitler. Your secret role is Liberal. --- Round 28 ---
President: Derek, Nominee for Chancellor: Maria

--- Round 19 ---
President: Philip, Nominee for Chancellor: Talia

--- Round 6 ---
President: George, Nominee for Chancellor: Talia
Ollama Request: [{'role': 'user', 'content': 'You are George, a player in Secret Hitler. Your secret role is Hitler.
